item.title: Blog Bootstrap
item.description: Howdy! ðŸ‘‹ This site will be an area for me to braindump everything and anything that comes across my mind - although I’ll try my best to keep it tech-focused! The blog platform itself is pretty basic. It is built using Hugo and hosted using GitHub Pages. While this isn’t exactly anything to brag about, it is only meant to be a quick and easy platform to spin up and get hosted so that I can focus on what really matters… the content!

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you wish to get in touch - reach me via @jdheyburn.
